docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:
Atlantic City's former Revel casino is moving toward its reincarnation as the Ocean Resort Casino.

headline.main: Former Revel Casino Moving Toward Reopening as Ocean Resort
headline.print_headline: Former Revel Casino Moving Toward Reopening as Ocean Resort

docs.snippet: The Environmental Protection Agency has exempted one of the nation's largest oil refining companies, Andeavor, from complying with U.S. biofuels regulations - a waiver historically reserved for tiny operations in danger of going belly up, two sour...

headline.main: Exclusive: EPA Gives Giant Refiner a 'Hardship' Waiver From Regulation
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: EPA Gives Giant Refiner a 'Hardship' Waiver From Regulation

docs.snippet: The Chinese industry body which recommended targeting scrap aluminium in retaliatory trade action against the United States is already exploring what other measures could be taken, an official said on Monday.

headline.main: China Metals Group Eyeing New Counter-Measures in U.S. Trade Row
headline.print_headline: China Metals Group Eyeing New Counter-Measures in U.S. Trade Row

docs.snippet: The U.S. military has announced Sunday that it launched an airstrike that killed five extremist militants in central Somalia.

headline.main: US Says Its Airstrike Kills 5 Militants in Central Somalia
headline.print_headline: US Says Its Airstrike Kills 5 Militants in Central Somalia

docs.snippet: A video with dozens of news anchors reading a script about "fake stories" put in stark visual terms what for weeks had largely been an academic debate about media consolidation and the Sinclair Broadcast Group's efforts to promote a consistent mes...

headline.main: Deadspin Video Illustrates Sinclair Stations' Messaging
headline.print_headline: Deadspin Video Illustrates Sinclair Stations' Messaging

docs.snippet: The caravan of Central American migrants that angered U.S. President Donald Trump was sidelined at a sports field in southern Mexico with no means of reaching the border even as Trump tweeted another threat to Mexico Tuesday.

headline.main: Migrant Caravan, Raising Concerns in US, Halts in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Migrant Caravan, Raising Concerns in US, Halts in Mexico

docs.snippet: Despite the wall-to-wall Facebook news of the past few weeks, lots of important things are happening in the tech world that don’t involve the company.

headline.main: Kevin’s Week in Tech: Extra! Extra! News Beyond Facebook!
headline.print_headline: Kevin’s Week in Tech: Extra! Extra! News Beyond Facebook!

docs.snippet: President Trump says foreign workers on H-1B visas take jobs away from Americans. Employers say they fill a labor shortage. Who’s right?

headline.main: What Are H-1B Visas, and Do They Hurt American Workers?

docs.snippet: There are ways to make life harder for American companies in China that need not be formal, or widely publicized.

headline.main: If There’s a U.S.-China Trade War, China May Have Some ‘Unconventional Weapons’
headline.print_headline: In Trade War, Usual Commerce Rules May Not Apply
